meanings.sent1: After the test, the teacher will be reteaching the lesson to the students.
meanings.sent2: The teacher decided to reteach the math concept for better understanding.
meanings.sent3: The students groaned when they heard about the reteaching session.
meanings.sent4: Reteaching the same material felt like going around in circles.
meanings.sent5: The reteaching session made the topic crystal clear.

meanings.definition: The act of teaching something again.
meanings.sent1: The reteaching of the science experiment was helpful for the students.
meanings.sent2: Reteaching is common in educational settings to ensure comprehension.
meanings.sent3: The reteaching session turned into a fun review game.
meanings.sent4: Her reteaching style was like a refreshing breeze in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The importance of reteaching became evident after the students' improved performance.
